response.original_title: Andrea Bocelli - Under the Desert Sky
response.overview: This spectacular DVD features Bocelli's first-ever pop performance taped live on a specially constructed floating stage in Lake Las Vegas. This special DVD includes music from the CD, Amor. Also included is exclusive bonus content including duets with American Idol finalist Katherine McPhee, Heather Headley, Stevie Wonder, and Chris Botti.  Andrea Bocelli underwent a radical transformation for this concert recording, which marks his first-ever performance as a pop vocalist. The show was recorded at the Lake Las Vegas resort, and sees the charming Bocelli performing 18 songs.

production_companies.name: A Produstio of Sugar s.r.l. & Trirteen, WHET New York
